defectdetector.camera package

Submodules

defectdetector.camera.camera module

class defectdetector.camera.camera.Camera(config: str, save=False, trigger: int = 0)

Bases: Controller

TriggerType = ['SOFTWARE', 'HARDWARE']
capture()

Get an image from your current camera and convert it to ndarray format.

Returns

The image captured.

Return type

image (ndarray)

get_fps()

Gets the frame rate of the currently captured image.

get_node_map()

Get all node information of the camera.

Returns

all node information of the camera.

Return type

Dict

grab_next_image_by_trigger()

Use trigger to capture image. The software trigger only feigns being executed by the Enter key; what might not be immediately apparent is that there is not a continuous stream of images being captured; in other examples that acquire images, the camera captures a continuous stream of images. When an image is retrieved, it is plucked from the stream.

Returns

Captured image.

Return type

img (ndarray)

reset_trigger(trigger_config: Optional[Dict] = None) → bool

This function returns the camera to a normal state by turning off trigger mode.

Parameters

trigger_config (Dict) -- Configuration parameters for trigger. default: None.

Returns

Whether the configuration was successful.

Return type

Boolean

Parameters

acquisition_config (Dict) -- Configuration parameters for trigger. default: None.

Returns

Whether the configuration was successful.

Return type

Boolean

Parameters

buffer_config (Dict) -- Configuration parameters for buffer. default: None.

Returns

Whether the configuration was successful.

Return type

Boolean

set_node(node: Union[Dict, Sequence], node_name: str, symbolic: Optional[str] = None)

Set the node value based on the node name.

Parameters

  • node (Dict) -- Current node information.

  • node_name (str) -- Name of current node.

  • symbolic (str) -- The name of the target entry. default: None.

Returns

Whether the configuration was successful.

Return type

Boolean

set_pixel_format(pixel_format_config: Optional[Dict] = None) → bool

Configure the pixel format.

Parameters

pixel_format_config (Dict) -- Configuration parameters for pixel_format. default: None.

Returns

Whether the configuration was successful

Return type

Boolean

set_trigger(trigger_config: Optional[Dict] = None)

This function configures the camera to use a trigger. First, trigger mode is set to off in order to select the trigger source. Once the trigger source has been selected, trigger mode is then enabled, which has the camera capture only a single image upon the execution of the trigger.

Parameters

trigger_config (Dict) -- Configuration parameters for trigger. default: None.

Returns

Whether the configuration was successful.

Return type

Boolean

setup_cap()

Initialize the camera before acquiring images.

The default initialization process includes:

  • Init Camera instance of PySpin.

  • Get nodemap of current Camera instance.

  • Get whole nodemap dict of current Camera instance.

  • Setup pixel format.

  • Setup buffer.

  • Setup trigger.

  • Setup acquisition mode.

  • Begin acquisition。

staticMetaObject = PySide6.QtCore.QMetaObject("Camera" inherits "Controller": )
stop()

Stop capturing images

defectdetector.camera.nodemap module

defectdetector.camera.nodemap.get_category_node_and_all_feature(node, level, layer)

Gets information about all nodes under a category node based on the name and rank of that category.

Parameters

  • node (IValue) -- A node object.

  • level (int) -- The level of the layer.

  • layer (str) -- The name of the layer.

Returns

Information about all nodes under the category node.

Return type

nodes_info_dict (Dict)

defectdetector.camera.nodemap.get_enumeration_node_and_current_entry(node)

Gets information about enumerating class nodes.

Parameters

node (IValue) -- A node object.

Returns

Information for a node.

Return type

node_info (Dict)

defectdetector.camera.nodemap.get_node_info(node)

Gets information about a single node, including the node name and corresponding value.

Parameters

node (IValue) -- A node object.

Returns

Information for a node.

Return type

node_info (Dict)

defectdetector.camera.nodemap.get_whole_nodemap(cam)

Get a dictionary containing information about all the parameters of the camera.

Parameters

cam (Camera) -- A camera instance.

Returns

A dict of all nodes and node information. Used to display and manipulate all parameters of the camera.

Return type

nodemap_dict (Dict)

setup_cap()

Initialize the camera before acquiring images.

The default initialization process includes:

  • Init Camera instance of PySpin.
